statements: DELETE FROM surveys WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 AND feedback LIKE '%poor%';
DELETE FROM surveys WHERE beneficiary_id IN (SELECT beneficiary_id FROM beneficiaries WHERE age < 18);
DELETE FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id = 1 AND survey_score > 80;
DELETE FROM BeneficiaryInformation WHERE beneficiary_name LIKE 'John%' OR address LIKE '%Street';
DELETE FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id IN (SELECT response_id FROM SurveyResonses WHERE survey_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM Beneficiaries WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Beneficiaries WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM Surveys WHERE survey_date < '2022-01-01' AND completed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM responses WHERE submitted_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
DELETE FROM aid_programs WHERE end_date < CURRENT_DATE;
